sometimes I get tired of it too. Since Wolveritron was hit by Razor claws f=
oot I take it he was cut.

Razor Claw fealt the feal of mech fluid on the c=
laws on his feet. He was pleased with himself. He ducked his head forward m=
aking the blow to his neck miss. He curled backward feeling the slash in th=
e back.

A sudden gut fealing told him he was badly hurt as a set of claws =
ripped into him. The raptor screamed in pain collapsing to the ground convu=
lsing and spitting mech fluid. His body jerked back and forth.

Razor Claw =
transformed to bot mode, the virus causing it to appear to mealt back to pr=
otoform. "What have you done to me!!!!!" He yelled, his rage welling up ins=
ide of him. He fealt no pain as he collapsed in shock not knowing why such =
little damage would cause such a reaction.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February =
22, 2001 7:32 AM
  Subject: Re: is that the best you got?


  Actully, I'm =
getting tired of this RPG
   
  ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
   
      Wol=
veritron got hit by the foot. He swung his claws on his left hand out at th=
e raptor, aiming for the next. His right hand claws swung for the guys gut.=

      Eclipse went around to the back out the bot, and started to claw at =
his back. Ramus used his arm blades and started to claw at his right side.
=
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 11:03 AM
    Subject: is=
 that the best you got?


    12 blasts from three sides huh. bad move for =
the ones on the left and right. OK hows this?

    Razor Claw forced his wa=
y forward getting pummeled by the majority of the shots. He lept upward cau=
sing some of the shots from the side to head toward the opposite bot. The b=
leeding raptor worked his way close enough to Wolveritron where future shot=
s could hit either one. he slashed at the bot with his clawed feat. "Fight =
for yourself coward your friends will have more than enough opportunities t=
o die later, nows your turn. Do you here the Matrix calling you home?" The =
beast had lost it's mind or it would have thought to hold still and use his=
 forcefield instead of getting beat upon in a three on one fight.

    (Com=
e on Dachande you afraid of a little scratch?)

      ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
      From: dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent=
: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 9:16 AM
      Subject: Re: Dachande did you =
forget?


      I must have.
       
      ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
  =
     
          They all fired their weapons at the raptor, and the were to=
 the front of him, the left and the right. Each 4 times.
        ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 11:54 AM
        Subject:=
 Fw: Dachande did you forget?


        heres the last post I have for the =
fight between Razor Claw and Wolveritron.
        ----- Original Message --=
--- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        =
Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 7:31 AM
        Subject: Re: Dachande respo=
nd or else


        Razor Claw glared at the three opponents with hate in =
his eyes and drool dripping from his jaw. The raptor no longer had control =
of his actions and wouldn't be stopped until justice had been served. "You =
fear me." He states through a half closed mouth. 

        He looked back a=
t his origional prey, "You fear me so much that you will not fight one on o=
ne." He took a few steps forward lowering his head to the level of Wolverit=
ron so they could look eye to eye. The anger and hatred split the air as th=
e two looked toward each other. The teeth of one and the claws of the acuse=
d reflected in the light around. Two bots enter, one bot leaves and if Razo=
r Claw had his way the Wolverine in bot mode would be the apetizer.


     =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: dachande 
          To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 6:30 AM
 =
         Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


          ::Wolveritron/Ec=
lipse/Ramus::
           
              "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron=
 said. "Because you ticked me off."
              Eclipse transformed to hi=
s full out battle mode, standing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to t=
heir full length, 5 inches. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to hav=
e mech fluid on them.
              Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed =
it at Razor Claw.
              "We're ready for ya," They said. They would=
 not make the first move, though.
            ----- Original Message ----- =

            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    =
        Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
            Subject: Re: Da=
chande respond or else


            Razor Claw rolled out the busted winds=
hield using the tuck and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

      =
      "You decide to fight after all I see." the raptor yells in his rage. =
he charges forward biting at Wolveritron. "You fight me now, after leaving =
your team to fight alone? I will kill you slowly."


              ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
              From: dachande 
              To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, February 10, 2001 7:47 AM
=
              Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


              He is.
=
               
              ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
               =

                  His claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin o=
thers fight for me, Bub?"
                  "Wolveritron, this is what he w=
ants," Eclipse said, putting his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't=
 give it to him."
                  "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolver=
itron said.
                  Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a =
twin of Ramulus). "I have no problem giving him what he wants."
           =
       He didn't fire though.
